kpi.name: mob_vlr40c

kpi_info.title: Intra-VLR LU attempts in the target VLR (GSM)
kpi_info.use: Indicates the total amount of location updates inside a VLR. Periodic location updates are included. UMTS not included.
kpi_info.formula:
sum(
IntraVLRIntraPLMNHSGSMAttempt
+ IntraVLRIntraPLMNRSGSMAttempt
+ IntraVLRInterPLMNHSGSMAttempt
+ IntraVLRInterPLMNRSGSMAttempt
+ PeriodicLocRegGSMAttempt )

Counters from view(s):
RNS_PS_VLR1MSC_MSC_{time_agg}, RNS_PS_VR1MCBH_MSC_{time_agg}

kpi.kpi_alias: Intra-VLR LU attempts in the target VLR (GSM)
